remarks: The binary relationship form of the ` Restrict ` function.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
brrestrict.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
brrestrict.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
brrestrict.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
brrestrict $p |- ( <. A , B >. Restrict C <-> C = ( A |` B ) ) $.
